Title: Enacts the "ICE ban in hospitals and shelters act"
Summary: Prohibits civil arrest in hospital, shelter, food bank, and crisis center settings; except to address an imminent safety situation or if they have an appropriate judicial warrant or judicial order.
LawCode: Add ยง29, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting civil arrest in hospitals, shelters, food banks and crisis centers
